Articles.Content:
Ahoy KSP enthusiasts,

I've been playing for a while now, finally decided to unlurk on the forum (I'll probably end up lurking the addon and releases board anyway).

I'm mostly re-creating anime and movie spaceships, so I might post some of the works on the craft exchange

Cyall around,

Xrave
Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear that you've been enjoying yourself so far.
